about.title: About Me
about.paragraph: Colombian <0>Computer Engineer</0> with focus on web development, experience in both frontend and backend technologies. My journey has been one of continuous exploration and learning, allowing me to work with various technologies and methodologies. Dedicated to providing efficient and reliable solutions in the <0>ever-evolving world</0> of web development.

projects_list.title: Simple blog Django REST Framework + Vue
